casebody.data:
STATE of North Carolina
v.
Marvin Louis MILLER, Jr. No. 268P18 Supreme Court of North Carolina. December 5, 2018 Leslie C. Rawls, Attorney at Law, Charlotte, for Miller, Marvin Louis (Jr.). James D. Concepcion, Assistant Attorney General, Trey Robison, District Attorney, for State of North Carolina.

ORDER

Upon consideration of the Petition for Discretionary Review filed by the State on 11 September 2018, the Petition is ALLOWED for the limited purpose of remanding to the Court of Appeals for reconsideration in light of State v. Rogers, --- N.C. ----, ----, 817 S.E.2d 150 (2018).

By Order of this Court in Conference, this 5th day of December, 2018.
